lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This reflected the reclassification of Brazilian loans, a reduced federal income tax rate (which affected the calculation of the taxabale-equivalent adjustment on tax-exempt assets) and a narrowing of the spread between the prime rate and Chemical's cost of funds.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said the rise was mainly due to staff costs associated with continued growth in consumer, capital markets and investment banking activities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Chemical also placed 52 mln dlrs of loans to Ecuador on non-accrual because the Quito government also suspended interest payments on its foreign debt.
